com.conversantmedia.mapreduce.tool

Class PosixParserRequiredProps

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.commons.cli.Parser
      • org.apache.commons.cli.PosixParser
        • com.conversantmedia.mapreduce.tool.PosixParserRequiredProps
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLineParser

    public class PosixParserRequiredProps
extends org.apache.commons.cli.PosixParser
    An extension to the base PosixParser that allows 'required' arguments to be passed in a properties file as well as the command line. By default, the properties file props aren't removed from the required list.

      • validateProperties

        protected void validateProperties(org.apache.commons.cli.Options options,
                      Properties properties)
                           throws org.apache.commons.cli.UnrecognizedOptionException
        Verifies that the properties don't contain undefined options which will cause the base parser to blowup.
        Parameters:
        options - the options config
        properties - overriding properties
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.cli.UnrecognizedOptionException - if a property exists that isn't configured in the options.
